Documentation¶

rawls¶

rawls.rawls

Rawls class used to open .rawls path image

rawls.stats

RawlsStats class which enables statistics other multiples Rawls instance

rawls.utils

Utils function for .rawls file

rawls.scene¶

rawls.scene.details

Rawls rendering details information

rawls.scene.film

Film class which store Film information

rawls.scene.filter

Filter class which store Filter information

rawls.scene.camera

Camera class which store Camera information

rawls.scene.accelerator

Accelerator class which store Accelerator information

rawls.scene.integrator

Integrator class which store Integrator information

rawls.scene.sampler

Sampler class which store Sampler information

rawls.scene.lookAt

LookAt class information

rawls.scene.vector

3D vector representation

rawls.scene.params

Generic class which store module params information
